title: SkinScope AI – Skincare Ingredient Safety Analyzer
description: Built an AI-powered skincare assistant that analyzes uploaded product images, performs OCR-based ingredient extraction, and uses LangChain RAG + FAISS retrieval to verify safety levels against dermatology and toxicology datasets. Integrated canonicalization and contextual safety-explanation chains, reducing manual ingredient research time by 90%.

title: Women Health Bot
description: Developed an AI-powered women’s health chatbot using advanced NLU and LLMs for symptom assessment, menstrual tracking, and mental wellness support. Delivered 95% accurate responses and privacy-first recommendations for accessible digital healthcare.

title: Mood Enhancer – Conversational AI Agent
description: Built a mood-enhancing chatbot that transforms text into uplifting audio using LangChain + OpenAI’s LLM. Integrated conversation memory for context-aware replies and deployed gTTS audio output for immersive user engagement. Achieved 90% satisfaction scores.

title: Predicting Cognitive Decline using Transfer Learning
description: Designed an EfficientNetB4 model for MRI-based Alzheimer’s detection, improving accuracy by 15% through transfer learning and early stopping. Achieved faster convergence (−30% training time) via Hyperband tuning for clinical-grade reliability.

title: Crown-of-Thorns Starfish (COTS) Detection using Transformers
description: Developed a DETR-based transformer model for marine species detection, reaching 92% accuracy and 0.85 mAP. Fine-tuned on 400 coral-reef images, reducing detection errors by 20% with PyTorch Lightning and hyperparameter optimization.

title: Audio Assistant Based Image Captioning System
description: Developed a real-time audio captioning system using CNN-LSTM, improving navigation accuracy by 35% for visually impaired users. Enhanced model integration and achieved 90% satisfaction on usability testing.

title: Pneumonia Detection using Deep Learning
description: Built a CNN-based model achieving 93% accuracy for pneumonia detection and reduced diagnosis time by 40%. Standardized performance across imaging datasets to ensure clinical reliability and scalability.

title: Tollywood Movie Recommendation System
description: Developed a personalized movie recommender using collaborative filtering and LLM-powered embeddings for Tollywood cinema. Improved user engagement with accurate genre-based recommendations and interactive UX.
